SEARCH
Package hope

Class Service

java.lang.Object
hope.Service
public class Service extends Object
Provides functionality related to services. Services can be listed and details about each service can be retrieved.

This class allows the creation of services and provides methods to list all available services and get the details of a specific service. Each service has attributes like service ID, name, description, department ID, fee, and required documents.

  • Constructor Details

    • Service

      public Service(int serviceId, String serviceName, String description, int departmentId, double fee, String requiredDocuments)
      Constructs a new Service with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      serviceId - The unique identifier of the service.
      serviceName - The name of the service.
      description - The description of the service.
      departmentId - The ID of the department to which the service belongs.
      fee - The fee associated with the service.
      requiredDocuments - The documents required for the service.

  • Method Details

    • listAllServices

      public static void listAllServices()
      Lists all available services.

      This method displays the service ID and service name of all services available in the system.

    • getServiceDetails

      public static void getServiceDetails(int serviceId)
      Gets details about a specific service.
      Parameters:
      serviceId - The ID of the service to retrieve details for. If the service exists, it prints the service's name, description, fee, and required documents. If not, it indicates that the service was not found.

    • calculateFee

      public double calculateFee()
      Calculates the fee for the service.
      Returns:
      The fee associated with the service.
